One day a magical creature appeared. It was called a 'permit'. This permit allowed the pick to do something special. The pick was now able to give the people something they wanted.
The people in the village were so excited. They had never seen anything like this before. They allowed the pick to give them what they wanted.
The pick granted everyone their wishes. Everyone was so happy, they laughed and cheered.
The mysterious pick and the permit had made everyone in the village very happy. They all thanked the magical creature for granting them their wishes.

The creature smiled and said, "My name is Jim, and I'm very creative. I was trying to yield something wonderful out of this place".
The soldier looked impressed. He said, "That's amazing! I've never seen anything like it before". Then he said goodbye to Jim and headed off on his mission.
The soldier's experience made him realise that even in dark and scary places, people can still find creative things to do. Whenever he felt afraid, he remembered Jim and was thankful for being so brave.
